article_title: MS diagnosis gives Miss Kentucky a platform and perspective to enjoy the ride
article_text: Ramsey Carpenter felt the first symptoms of multiple sclerosis competing in the Miss Kentucky pageant when she was 19. Now 23, she has the title and is using it to spread MS awareness all the way to Atlantic City this week where she is competing for the Miss America crown.

article_summary:
Ramsey Carpenter felt the first symptoms of multiple sclerosis competing in the Miss Kentucky pageant when she was 19.
Now 23, she has the title and is using it to spread MS awareness all the way to Atlantic City this week where she is competing for the Miss America crown.
